Hello Kerbals! Welcome to my latest venture! As you may know our factory floor is shut while the engineers deal with "The Big Two One" as it is being called. So, I decided to take a break* from fighting with marketing and trolls and just get back to basics. Ahhh, yes! Just the thing, I already feel like a new being...

Inspired by the engineers truly epic bender I decided to open a Pub. Here is a sketch we did on a napkin. I admit it needs a bit of ooomph, but its early days indeed.

You might say its a bit small. All the easier to move about I say! And may I remind you that I have eons of experience with hyperspace folding, and it will be at least 15% bigger on the inside than on the out. Ha! And lots of kitch and extra plenty of faux charm (whatever that means) I do assure you!

Not sure where I am going to put it. Maybe at the foot of Herings Wall (rest in pieces my friend) or perhaps near that saucer on your Mun. I fancy I could tinker with it in my spare time. Maybe get it running again. Nothing like the classics...

Krag

Krag Rule #8. We will refuse to serve you if you do not appear intoxicated.

*layoof

<Reserved for the fictionally challenged>

For those of you going Wha??? I make mods. And I choose to do status updates in character because it amuses me (and I hope others). It meant as satire.*

Bottom line:

-I am making a Mod. Current plan is a deployable base with "special features"

-No release date yet. More details to follow

*And for whatever whacky reason it is protected up the wazoo by US copyright law

This pub has me excited, so much so I just cracked another beer just for this thread

Ah, Mr. Kragrathean. It's so nice to see you again. I'm quite sure your fine new establishment will become popular in our small community. It is also good to hear that your engineers are hard at work. Do you think a crate of apples would motivate them further? And we have a leather whip gathering dust in one of our warehouses. It was in Number 13 if memory serves me. One of our associates brought it from this barbaric planet Earth - it is yours if you wish so.
I truly missed you Kerbals! I show you a pub and you start thinking about how to pluck it into orbit! How about coming in for a pint or two before you upset the kegs with all the sloshing about eh?
May I model some innards for said establishment? I am experienced in the fine art of Barrelling and distillery fabrication.

How funny that I hadn't considered the lack of pubs in the Kerbalverse before. What a wonderful idea! I would love to stop by for a pint or 9. The design looks beautiful, just the thing a Kerbal wants to see on the way home from a hard day exploding rockets. (Or maybe before a day spent exploding rockets:)
The Restaurant at the End of the Universe?

No, the Bar at the Bottom of the Mun (or wall). Or as I like to call it "Krag's Pub".

Also we will serve no drinks with a name ending in "blaster". Anyone asking for one of those will be summarily beaten unconscious. It amounts to the same thing but is slightly cheaper. (Krag Rule #23)

Edited July 31, 2013 by Kragrathea

....

So, can we start designing drinks now for this pub?
His persona sounds Like Cave Johnson.. Awesome..
Hey Krag, just wondering if you're still around, or have retreated to your pub to drown your sorrows cause by 0.21's universe breaking. Hope all's well!

Ah Mr Shiftly! I missed your spiked visage...

I am, alas, still on "holiday" from the factory while the engineers do their thing. They come in from time to time (ah here come a few dozen now..) and from what I can tell (between pours) progress is indeed being made. And apparently the new 0.21 will allow us to produce even better planets! Good news indeed eh Kerbals?

The bar is going swimmingly. In no small part because it is currently parked halfway between the engineers break room and the executives private loo.

Just a reminder, that while not expressly forbidden, roleplay is highly discouraged on the forums.

Just a reminder, that while not expressly forbidden, roleplay is highly discouraged on the forums.

Not trying to be snarky, but nowhere in the forum rules, nor in sal_vager's Good Conduct Guide is role playing mentioned. We are, in fact, discussing a game which primary purpose (as stated by devs) is to have fun. Since RP further contributes to fun with no detriment to the community (much the opposite IMO), I see no reason why it's worthy of moderation.

Well, some of you may not know the history of roleplay on the forums. We had a number of people that wanted to RP and we gave them a place to do so. It did not end well. We had to close it down. There was even an attempt to start an off-site place for KSP RP, but it went bad as well.

So while we don't have a specific rule against it, as stated, we do discourage it. For now we are leaving this thread open, but should it degenerate, we'll be forced to lock it.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
